term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - folded-chain crystal in polymers
term.title: folded-chain crystal

item.text: A polymer crystal consisting predominantly of chains that traverse the crystal repeatedly by folding as they emerge at its external surfaces. The re-entry of the chain into the crystal is assumed to be adjacent or near-adjacent within the lattice.
